title: Reel Crypto
author: Reel Crypto
created_time: November 21, 2023, 02:11:02 PMLast edit: August 08, 2024, 02:55:46 PM by Reel Crypto
content: Hey crypto enthusiasts,Ready for an unbeatable crypto gaming experience? Look no further cause we are about to introduce Reel Crypto - the ultimate online crypto casino!Why Reel Crypto? 1. Robust Security: We prioritize your crypto security with top-notch encryption and safeguards, ensuring your assets are protected at all times.  2. Fair Play: Transparency is our motto. Our games are provably fair, ensuring trust and fairness for every player.3. Speedy Transactions: Say goodbye to delays. With us, crypto deposits and withdrawals happen in a flash, letting you access your winnings without a hitch.4. Rich Bonuses: We love to spoil our players! Get ready for a host of generous bonuses, promos, and loyalty rewards like cashback, to boost your gaming excitement.5. Game Variety: Whether you prefer slots, table games, live dealers, or more, our diverse game selection has something for everyone.6. 24/7 Support: Need assistance? Our expert support team is available around the clock to address your queries and issues.Ready to dive in? Visit ReelCrypto.com to register and snag your exclusive welcome bonus!Elevate your gaming with Reel Crypto!

comments.author: KingsDen
comments.body: Welcome to the forum.The forum is always glad and willing to accept and welcome new casinos. Here is an enabling platform for growth especially for honest projects.You have to include links to images, such that when you are able to buy  copper membership, your Announcement thread will look beautiful.Also note that there is no hyper link in your post. It will be easier for anyone to click a link to your website than type it out manually in a browser tab.

comments.author: Bureau
comments.body: Welcome Reel Crypto!As KingsDen correctly said you need to create good looking announcement page for your casino. For that you would need to buy the Copper membership. It will allow you to post attractive images and will help you to get active forum members. I was going through the information you have mentioned struggled a little to find the link to your casino. Found it but it was not an active link. Such problems can be solved with the mentioned membership account.

comments.author: rhomelmabini
comments.body: Welcome to the forum! To be honest, there's already sites out here that has more gaming experience compare to your casino but what's really your edge compare to them? By the way, maybe you'll try signature campaign, that's one way to be known here, just a suggestion to introduce it more to gamblers alike.

comments.author: Eternad
comments.body: Quote from: Reel Crypto on November 21, 2023, 02:11:02 PM2. Fair Play: Transparency is our motto. Our games are provably fair, ensuring trust and fairness for every player.How your games are transparent while you are offering games from 3rd party game providers that doesn’t have open source code. There’s no way to verify bets on this kind of games. You are just the usual casino that offers close source game that user only rely on trust for the game to be probably fair when playing. Your casino looks like very plain and the game pictures is too huge that it only displays limited games on screen which is bad when browsing.

comments.author: Little Mouse
comments.body: 1. What's the multiplier required for the welcome bonus to be eligible for withdrawal?2. There's a 50 free spin on Sweet Bonanza if someone deposits 100 EURo, with a value of 1 EURO each. Are there any wagering requirements for the winning from free spins? They aren't detailed in the promotion section.

I hope he does upgrade to help their cause, another new casino claims that they are the best online casino when it has only been online for one year and the gambling community barely knows it, if it is the best online casino it should have a good marketing team with a knowledgeable representative who know how things work here in Bitcointalk, but it's obvious based on how he created his thread that he knows nothing.I hope OP come back here to read all our suggestions and recommendation it's not yet too late to correct this, I recommend taking a visit on the busiest thread and getting an idea.

comments.author: Slow death
comments.body: welcome to the forum, I won't say what has already been suggested here by other members, I could see that in your casino you don't have a Twitter account, something very strange given that many casinos are very active on Twitter giving bonuses and more gifts. so twitter is an indispensable tool for casinos just like this forum is also very important for casinos to get traffic and customers and reputation when the casino works well and is honest. I was also able to see your TOS and I think that when people think about creating an account they should take the time to read it, unlike the TOS of many casinos where you see a short TOS, in your casino the TOS is very long, it takes many minutes to readBut I make a point of posting an excerpt from your tos so that people can read it and when they create an account they won't complain later:Quote from: https://www.reelcrypto.com/en/terms9. Identity checks9.1. To prevent fraud, money laundering and underage gambling, it is important that we verify Players’ identities.9.2. We may run verification checks at various points of a Player’s tenure while a Player is registered. For example, at the point of registration, when Players request withdrawals or if we notice irregular Betting Account behaviour.source: https://www.reelcrypto.com/en/termsEven though your TOS is a very long text, I recommend that people take the time and read it all and then they can create an account, to avoid having problems after depositing, playing and wanting to withdraw. and talking about your TOS, I could also see this:This means that your casino has been operating for some time, can you tell us when your casino started operating?can you tell us if your casino has links with this token " Reel Token "?when looking at the token website: https://www.reelcrypto.io  Has a similar domain name to your website

But until then be good and keep working on improving the overall state of you project and let see his that goes along the line, Expect to see more another form of promotions for your team that will attract new players to your casino.

As you can see for yourself other members have began a good review for your casino which would help you build up very well as to meet up to the forum standard. You have already been advised to upgrade to copper membership which is a wise one because first impression matters so when people see the outlook of your casino, they would know what your casino is upto. If you really want good reviews from this platform to assist you in building up to the fullest, look into the advice given by members so you could be able to develop your casino to the forum standard.

comments.body: Let me join in welcoming you as well to the forum, there are many opportunities you could explore for in the large bitcointalk community and in the gambling sectors to be more specific, but you just need to be the kind of gambling platform that can be trusted, then try create time in reading through every response provided to you here and try to push your gambling casino to the next level right from the forum here.

comments.author: Bitinity
comments.body: Quote from: salad daging on November 21, 2023, 05:26:27 PMYes, the promotion section is not very clear, maybe you have to log in to your account to see more details, but I hope the casino representative will elaborate so that we know more about the promotion with this welcome deposit.You dont have to log in to see the details of the promotion, I can see the terms and conditions of the welcome offer promo without an account as below image: Coming up to wagering requirement, there are 2 wagering requirement. 40x for the deposit bonus and 35x for the winning from the free spins. For more information, you can go to the promotions page, click the "read more", scroll down until you find "terms and condition", click it and you'll see as shown on above image.

comments.author: SamReomo
comments.body: First of all, I would like to welcome you to this amazing forum where you can share about your platform and most probably get the exposure that you want to have. Although, you have created your announcement thread in the right board but unfortunately it won't be able to get much attention as there aren't any images in it. I recommend you to go for Cooper membership as that will allow you to add images into your announcement thread which will ultimately increase the exposure of your announcement thread on the forum. Players want to see graphics on an announcement thread however your announcement thread is lacking those graphics which you can add when you purchase Cooper membership.Your Casino seems like a good one to me and I believe that you'll get players from this forum who will use your casino and that's why I also recommend you to have a signature campaign so that you'll get more exposure to your site.

comments.author: bitterguy28
comments.body: welcome to the forum , and hope you will have a good stay here ..But what I noticed is another site promoted by Newly created account , does not even bother purchasing Copper Membership , and also has a very poor ANN Thread presentation , not even your Site Link was presented so sorry to question your intention in this promotion.are you even part of the team/owner of this site? please be aware that players will not engage in your site with this kind of advertising .

comments.author: Text
comments.created_time: November 22, 2023, 06:44:47 AMLast edit: November 22, 2023, 07:13:37 AM by Text
comments.body: Quote from: Little Mouse on November 21, 2023, 02:52:43 PM1. What's the multiplier required for the welcome bonus to be eligible for withdrawal?2. There's a 50 free spin on Sweet Bonanza if someone deposits 100 EURo, with a value of 1 EURO each. Are there any wagering requirements for the winning from free spins? They aren't detailed in the promotion section.Is this what you are looking for? Seems you missed this:QuoteThis sign-up offer is valid for players registered at Reel Crypto Casino after the 25th of May, 2023This offer is valid only for first-time depositors at the casinoThe first deposit needs to be made within 30 days of registeringThe bonus can only be wagered in Casino and Live Casino products.The minimum deposit required to qualify for the deposit bonus offer is €50Minimum deposit required to receive 50 free spins is €100If a withdrawal is requested before completing the wagering requirement all remaining bonuses and free spins will be canceclled.Remaining free spins will be cancelled if a withdrawal is requested within the first 5 days from the first deposit.The 100% bonus applies to all deposits of €10,000 or if your deposit is above 10,000 EUR you will get a total of 10,000 EUR bonus.There is no cap on winnings or withdrawalsUsing bonus funds to ‘buy’ the bonus stages of games where a ‘buy bonus’ feature is present will result in the forfeiture of the bonus and the winnings from the final bonus round to be voided.The maximum bet value for contributing to wagering is €3.Winnings from ‘Free Spin’ or ‘bonus’ features initiated with bonus funds but completed after the bonus has been wagered, lost, or forfeited will be removed.Bonus money must be wagered at least 40x (bonus) before you can make a withdrawal. For example: If you deposit €100, you will receive a bonus of €100 and play with a total of €200. Winnings from the Free Spins must be wagered x35 before requesting a withdrawal.Depending on the type of games you play the contribution towards the wagering requirement is different:Quote from: Slow death on November 21, 2023, 04:41:47 PM-snipThis means that your casino has been operating for some time, can you tell us when your casino started operating?can you tell us if your casino has links with this token " Reel Token "?when looking at the token website: https://www.reelcrypto.io  Has a similar domain name to your websiteThis means that your casino has been operating for some time, can you tell us when your casino started operating?"ReelCrypto started operating in December 2022."can you tell us if your casino has links with this token " Reel Token "?"Unfortunately, we are different from that site."I tried to chat with their live customer support, Krystal, and she's online.So I got those answers instantly.According to her, they don't have direct contact in this forum.

comments.author: Nrcewker
comments.body: Welcome to the forum mate. According to me the ANN thread could have been designed better by using good animations and images. Reading plain text doesn’t excites me to visit the site. Moreover now a days everyone wants something unique from a casino. But the things that you have mentioned in the OP, are already provided by almost all the casinos. At last there is a link to the casino missing in the ANN thread(I can see only the domain name). Please add it. Will leave a detailed review after trying the game.
